name: Huldra (JHauge, MrSpectacle)
description:
You play as a mythical being from Norwegian folklore, you and the forest, are as one.

Humanity has has entered a new industrial era, they have now  found a way to harvest the resources from the magically enchanted woods. Ignorant to the consequences of their actions, the greed driven humans continue to harvest the trees.

State of the game:

The game is in very early stages of development and is regarded by the developers as in an playable alpha state, albeit unfinished and  several unpolished elements (and probably a few bugs here and there)

All aspects of the game is subject to change and nothing is finalized yet.

Developed by John Hauge & Kenneth Vassbakk
